```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(rvest)

plot_data <- read_rds("growth.rds")
```

```{r data_wrangling}
plot_data |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = GDP, fill = region)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~region)
